name: The Spectral Manse
tagline: A barren expanse of stagnant pools. The keening wind carries strains of distant violin music.

procedural.encounter_notes: Encounters are 2-in-6 likely to be with a bewildered banshee heading to a ball at the Spectral Manse
procedural.foraging_results: Successful foraging yields 1d2 portions of Bosun's Balm, in addition to the normal results

description: A barren expanse of stagnant pools. The keening wind carries strains of distant violin music.

points_of_interest.name: The Spectral Manse
points_of_interest.description: A thicket of twisted blackthorns stands amid a treacherous region of rivulets and sodden moss carpets. Those who push through the tangled branches arrive at a blue-tinged, spectral vision of a baroque manor of dark wood, its windows lit with the veiled glow of firelight behind drawn curtains. Strains of plaintive violin music can be heard from somewhere within.
points_of_interest.entering: The front door opens freely, or a window can be forced.
points_of_interest.interior: The manor exists in an odd dimension, halfway between Fairy and the mortal world. Interior walls appear skewed, passages twist at odd angles, and rooms seem to expand and contract as characters move through them. Violin music drifts in the air, though its origin is unclear.
points_of_interest.exploring: Roll on the Rooms and Encounters tables for each room entered. Each room connects to 1d3 other rooms, via crooked doors and lurching hallways.
points_of_interest.leaving: With the exception of any of Lord Hobbled-and-Blackened's possessions, items from the manse evaporate into mist when taken into the real world.
points_of_interest.inhabitants: Lord Hobbled-and-Blackened is imprisoned in the manse with a number of spectral guests.

roll_tables.name: Rooms
roll_tables.description: Roll when entering a new room

entries.title: Study
entries.description: Books of frost elf poetry, stag heads, ice hearth.

entries.title: Lounge
entries.description: Velvet couches, ice candles, wolf-skin rugs.

entries.title: Winter garden
entries.description: Hoar-clad roses drip blood if touched.

entries.title: Pantry
entries.description: Bottled emotions, iced fruits, frozen game.

roll_tables.name: Encounters
roll_tables.description: Roll when entering a new room

entries.description: Lord Hobbled-and-Blackened, manically playing a violin. He beseeches PCs to take a letter to Ygraine (declaring his love for her and pleading for her aid in escaping the manse). In return he offers his violin.

quest_hook.accept_prompt: Will you take the letter to Ygraine Mordlin?
quest_hook.accept_response: Lord Hobbled-and-Blackened's eyes light up with desperate hope. He thrusts the sealed letter and his precious violin into your hands, babbling rapid thanks in High Elfish.
quest_hook.decline_response: The frost elf's manic energy falters. His fingers continue to play, but the music turns mournful as he retreats into the shadows.

entries.description: 1d4 sleek, silver hounds (use seelie dog stats, DPB) growl and may attack non-Neutral aligned characters entering the room.

An aged elven lady with violet eyes and white, frost-clad hair in an extravagant beehive, waltzing and pirouetting to violin music. If asked to dance, she gladly accepts (partner must Save Versus Hold or be whisked away into the Prince's Roadâ€”see Fairy Roads, p26); otherwise she attacks any who disturb her (treat as a banshee, DMB).
entries.mechanical_effect: If asked to dance: Save Versus Hold or be whisked away into the Prince's Road

entries.description: 2 haughty frost elf courtiers (DMB). Roll 1d6: 1. Trysting, 2. Dancing ponderously, 3. Arguing about musical notes, 4. Looking for Lord Hobbled-and-Blackened (their host), 5. Lounging disinterestedly, 6. Duelling.
entries.sub_table: Roll 1d6: 1. Trysting, 2. Dancing ponderously, 3. Arguing about musical notes, 4. Looking for Lord Hobbled-and-Blackened (their host), 5. Lounging disinterestedly, 6. Duelling

entries.description: A portrait of a beautiful mortal woman dressed in a regal fur robe with a brilliant diamond upon her brow (Ygraine Mordlin, p84). The frame is carved with plaintive faces, weeping icy tears.

Furnishings dance to the strains of violin music. A grandfather clock groans and grates, its hands stuck at seven-past-noon. Opening the clock and fixing the mechanism (a silver dagger is stuck inside) causes the hands to start moving and slowly accelerate, along with the tempo of the violin music. Upon returning to the mortal world, 1d12 days have passed.
entries.mechanical_effect: Fixing clock causes 1d12 days to pass upon leaving

entries.description: A raging wind rips a window and its curtains from their fittings and proceeds to suck the room's contents outside into the dark. PCs must Save Versus Hold or be ejected back into the mortal world, the manor disappearing until the next full moon.
entries.mechanical_effect: Save Versus Hold or be ejected to mortal world; manor disappears until next full moon

entries.description: A great white stag's head has fallen from its mounting and lays on the carpet, moaning mournfully.

quest_hooks.title: A Letter for Ygraine
quest_hooks.description: Lord Hobbled-and-Blackened, imprisoned in the Spectral Manse for his forbidden love, beseeches you to deliver a letter declaring his love to Ygraine Mordlin and pleading for her aid in escaping. In return, he offers his magical violin.
quest_hooks.objective: Deliver the letter to Ygraine Mordlin
quest_hooks.reward_description: The magical violin (worth 10,000gp) - can cast Dominate once per week when played skilfully
quest_hooks.notes: The violin and letter are given upfront as a gesture of trust. The quest is completed when the letter is delivered to Ygraine.

npcs.name: Lord Hobbled-and-Blackened
npcs.description: A gaunt, icicle-thin frost elf courtier dressed in flamboyant white lace and a ruff of hoarfrost.
secrets: Once a court musician to Prince Mallowheart
Imprisoned here for falling in love with Ygraine Mordlin, the Prince's fosterling daughter
possessions: Magical violin, which when played skilfully can cast the arcane spell Dominate once a week (worth 10,000gp)

items.name: Magical Violin of Lord Hobbled-and-Blackened
items.description: A beautifully crafted violin of pale wood and silver strings. When played skilfully, it can cast the arcane spell Dominate once a week.
items.acquisition: Offered as payment for delivering a letter to Ygraine Mordlin
items.notes: One of Lord Hobbled-and-Blackened's possessions - does not evaporate when leaving the manse

items.name: Lord Hobbled-and-Blackened's Letter to Ygraine
items.description: A sealed letter of pale vellum, cold to the touch and edged with frost. The seal bears the sigil of a frozen rose. It contains Lord Hobbled-and-Blackened's declaration of love to Ygraine Mordlin and a desperate plea for her help in escaping his imprisonment in the Spectral Manse.
items.notes: Quest item - must be delivered to Ygraine Mordlin to complete the quest. One of Lord Hobbled-and-Blackened's possessions - does not evaporate when leaving the manse.
